#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    char a[200]={},b;
    int count=0;
    gets(a);
    cin>>b;
    int i=0;
    while(a[i]!='\0')
    {
        if(a[i]==b)
        count++;
        i++;
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;

    return 0;
}
